recipe.title: Bacon, Lettuce, Tomato, And Avocado Salad Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 handfuls ; cherry tomato, or grape tomatoes, halved

steps.step: Cook bacon until crispy. Drain on a paper towel, then set aside.
Place chopped lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, avocados and bacon in a large bowl.
In a small bowl, mix olive oil, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt, and lemon juice to form the dressing.
Toss the salad with the dressing.
